summary: RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR CAMPER DEADBOLT LOCK IN JANUARY 2014.  NHTSA RECALL # 13V-585.  CONTACTED COMPANY (FASTEC) ON 3/26/14 FOR REPLACEMENT.  THEIR NOTICE INDICATED IT WOULD TAKE 3-4 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY.  PHONED FASTEC TODAY AND THEIR MAILBOX IS FULL.  TO DATE, WE HAVE NOT RECEIVED LOCK NOR HAVE HAD ANY COMMUNICATION FROM FASTEC.  IT HAS BEEN 2 MONTHS.  THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE.   *TR
